product_description: A light weight panel cut with designs that form subtle patterns adding depth, nuance, and texture.

product_categories.category_name: Internal Wall Linings, finishes and partition systems

recyclable_percentage_description: Can be repurposed - reformed into ancillary fixings or new panels dependent on condition.
recyclable_offcuts_description: Autex products are made from 100% PET. Uncontaminated offcuts are homogenous PET which is 100% recyclable. Contact your local recycling facility to enquire about recycling PET textile offcuts.
recycling_process_description: Mechanically mounted products can be reused as they are. Autex has also developed bespoke recycling machinery to reprocess uncontaminated waste back into reusable rPET raw material.
reusable_description: Can be installed using proprietary or third party fixing to enable demount-ability
water_reduction_techniques: We have dry manufacturing facilities. No waste water is generated in the manufacturing of our products.
transport_emissions_minimisation_techniq: Freight emissions are accounted and fully offset annually. Air freight is avoided wherever possible. Packaging is fully consolidated and stock managed to reduce freighting TKM.
minimisation_design_strategy: Product is manufactured to standard construction sizes or made to order to suit specific lengths reduce wastage onsite, packaging and transportation loads.
risk_of_harm_posed_description: Accumulation of landfilled PET waste can contribute to pollution and the formation of microplastics. Diversion from landfills through recycling can reduce this risk.
specific_installation_methods: Spinfix 100% PET mounting clips provide a concealed fixing option and allows for reuse and recycling.  Adhesive fixing can contaminate the product making it unsuitable or more difficult to recycle.
type_of_packaging: Autex products are typically packaged in readily brown recyclable, compostable cardboard packaging. Packaging is made locally in Australia.

product_description: A lightweight panel made from compressed polyester felt that has endless design flexability

product_categories.category_name: Internal Wall Linings, finishes and partition systems

recyclable_percentage_description: Mechanically mounted products can be reused as they are. Autex has  developed bespoke recycling machinery to reprocess uncontaminated waste back into reusable rPET raw material.

reusable_description: Can be installed using proprietary Autex spinfix or third party fixings to enable demount-ability
water_reduction_techniques: We have dry manufacturing facilities. Waste water is not generated in the manufacturing of our products.
transport_emissions_minimisation_techniq: Freight emissions are accounted and fully offset annually. Airfreight is avoided wherever possible. Packaging is fully consolidated and stock managed to reduce freighting TKM.
minimisation_design_strategy: Product is manufactured to standard construction sizes or made to order to suit specific lengths helping the reduction of wastage onsite, packaging and transportation loads.

factory_finished_description:
Cube is  ready to install and is the base product used to create:
Frontier Acoustic baffle ceiling and wall system
Horizon Suspended and direct fixed  geometric shapes
Grid Tiles.
Groove.
Verve Contoured Panels.
Mirage Textured Panels.
Cascade Hanging Screens.
Vicinity Desk screens.
Lanes:  Battened linear style acoustic system.
specific_installation_methods: Refer to installation instructions for fixing options. Adhesive free options are available for all applications.
other_comments: Cube and the systems and product made from it contain a minimum of 80% recycled content and are recyclable. Cube can be installed using a variety of methods that will allow adaptive reuse, or eliminate contamination from adhesives. Adhesive free solutions will typically enhance the acoustic performance.
type_of_packaging: Autex products are typically packaged in brown recyclable, compostable cardboard packaging. Packaging is made locally in Australia.
